Sinesis and Sinister got tired of standing around and decided to have some
fun. Sinesis and Sinister stepped outside and walked around a bit. Then they
wondered away from the base and into the forest. Sinister laughed while
Sinesis kept telling him to be quiet. Sinesis spun around to silence
Sinister when a huge hand wrapped around his throat and threw him into a
tree. Stronghold stepped out.

"Your shouting and lauhging made me spill my beer." Stronghold said calmly.
Scamrock came out around the other way and kicked Sinister down. Arrow
started to kick Sinesis and Sinister while they were down. Sinesis shot his
pin dart into Arrow, but the toxins had no affect. Sinister drew out
hisweapon and threw it, it bounced off a tree and went spiraling through the
air until it reached Stronghold, who was too busy "SHOVING" Arrow out of the
battle that he didn't notice. Scamrock leapt through the air and kicked the
weapon down, the weapon slashing into his leg. Scamrock roared several times
before going down. Stronghold grabbed both Sinesis and Sinister and pinned
them to a tree. Arrow stepped in the get cheap shots in on them. Sinesis and
Sinister grabbed Strongholds hands, and even shot him several times, but he
would not let go.

"I had a Straight Flush, damn it! I would have whupped Scamrock and that
idiot Arrow both but then you have to come along and step on that branch!"
Stronghold was talking nonsense, of course, but in a way it actually made
since, that branch was supporting their card table that was made from a tree
stump. Stronghold released Sinesis and Sinoster and catches them again as
they fall, this time by the throats. Arrow laughed and started to suck up to
Stronghold, telling him how strong and deadly he was. Stronghold yelled and
squeezed harder...
